synopsis.text:
Since arriving in the bustling city of Baghdad, Aladdin, a humble water seller, has his life turned upside down when he encounters the captivating slave girl Miriam at an auction. Smitten by her beauty, Aladdin impulsively steals her away, and they share an unforgettable night together in an abandoned home. But fate cruelly intervenes, and they're torn apart just as suddenly as they'd come together.

In this magical world filled with unexpected twists and turns, Aladdin embarks on a thrilling journey to find his lost love. Along the way, he faces incredible challenges, from battling the notorious Forty Thieves to confronting giants and powerful genies. As he navigates these trials, Aladdin uncovers the possibility of a long-lost child and the hope of reuniting with his beloved Miriam.

Join Aladdin on this enchanting adventure as he fights for love, freedom, and self-discovery in a world where nothing is as it seems.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
